sections.heading: Creation of Michigan Office of Great Start Within Michigan Department of Education; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Office of Child Development and Care Within Department of Human Services, Head Start Collaboration Office Within Department of Human Services, and Office of Early Childhood Education
sections.text: Creation of Michigan Office of Great Start Within Michigan Department of Education; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Office of Child Development and Care Within Department of Human Services, Head Start Collaboration Office Within Department of Human Services, and Office of Early Childhood Education and Family Services Within Department of Education to Michigan Office of Great Start.
